page.title: 09ABBERLEY HALL SCHOOL
page.content: Abberley Hall is a boarding school for boys aged 8-13+. There are a small number of day boys and a Junior Department for children aged 4-7+ also attending daily.Class sizes are small, ranging from 7-16 pupils.Most subjects have their own rooms including a science laboratory, a technology room and a computer centre. Music holds an important place in school life. Art is a popular subject using a wide variety of materials.Plays or musicals are produced each year.Sports catered for are soccer, rugger, cricket, swimming, tennis and athletics. Expeditions are arranged in term time to various places of interest. Many hobby groups are run by the staff. In their spare time boys have free use of the various rooms and facilities, and enjoy activities in the extensive school grounds.
